UpdateAvailableWindow
public UpdateAvailableWindow()

Initialize the available update window with no initial date context (and thus no initial information on downloadable releases to show to the user)

public UpdateAvailableWindow(
UpdateAvailableWindowViewModel viewModel

Initialize the available update window with the given view model, which contains the information on the updates that are available to the end user

ShowReleaseNotes
public void ShowReleaseNotes(
string notes
)

Show the release notes to the end user. Release notes should be in HTML.  There is some bizarre thing where the WPF browser doesn't navigate to the release notes unless you successfully navigate to about:blank first. I don't know why. I feel like this is a Terrible Bad Fix, but...it works for now...

Parameter
notes
string

The HTML notes to show to the end user
